duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide outstanding customer service and proactively engage with customers to meet sales goals.
Demonstrate initiative by offering assistance, using suggestive selling techniques, and meeting solicitation and clienteling goals.
Utilize digital technology to enhance the customer shopping experience, including mobile devices, computer-based point-of-sale systems, and the Belk App.
Focus on achieving personal sales goals, increasing units sold per transaction, and maintaining a professional and pleasant work environment.
Assist with operations tasks, including merchandise unpacking, display set-up, and adherence to store policies.
No education requirement. Experience in retail preferred.
Ability to use computer keyboard, touchscreen monitor, and other related business equipment. Physical requirements include the ability to push/pull 100-500 pounds when moving stock carts.

education_certification.credential: No education requirement. Experience in retail preferred.
